resources.string:
"No bookmarks

Use the Edinburgh Bus Tracker app to add bookmarks first

"No bookmarks

Press the 'map' button above to view a map of stops.

From the map touch a stop on the map to display times, and then press menu to add a bookmark."

"Changes:
 * Implement bus travel direction on map.
 * Implement stop barcode scanning support.
 * Update for website changes.
 * Nearby stops now uses WIFI as well as GPS for location.
 * Auto traffic alerts now disabled by default; can be re-enabled in menu of traffic alerts display.
 "
